biotools.summary: A multi-agent architecture for feature selection, called MAgentOmics, to consider all omics data together. MAgentOmics extends the ant colony optimization algorithm to multi-omics data, which iteratively builds candidate solutions and evaluates them. Moreover, a new fitness function is introduced to assess the candidate feature subsets without using prediction target such as survival time of patients.

bioschemas.name: MAgentOmics
